head.title: Welcome to the School District of New London

div.h2: All School Buildings Closed as of 3/17/20

div.div:
Please note that all school buildings are closed due to COVID-19. Please contact your school to schedule pick up of anything necessary.
Please READ MORE to view the current School District of New London update regarding COVID-19 (Coronavirus).
